products.name: Assassin
products.description: John Wilkes Booth made history by assassinating the 16th President, Abraham Lincoln, April the 14th. He managed to evade custody for 12 days, before he was found and shot for his crimes. What a DREG!

products.name: ManEater
products.description: At the age of 32, Issei Sagawa killed and ate his first victim. When attempting to dump the body in a river, he was discovered and taken into custody by the french authorities. Absolute DREG!
